name: void 2 (warfpea)
description:
Void 2 is the sequel to Warfpea Entertainment's critically acclaimed game, with all new original music and art.

Fight your way through 5 levels of epic bullet hell action like a true gamer, and finish the job started in the original Void. swag.

In the first void, I plagiarized pretty much everything. This time I made everything other than a couple skins, and some stuff relating to the ""story"" from the first game.

Also, it isn't insanely clunky and terrible to play!!!! woooooo

Controls

WASD to move
Mouse to aim
Left mouse button to shoot
Spacebar to use ability
V to drink health potion
B to vibrate your character for some reason
Lshift to move slowly for potentially easier dodging

:^)
